Qala Hotel is located in Khodzha-Akhrar, within 3.2 km of Bukhara and 4.7 km of Tsyplan. Featuring room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. Udurgi is 6 km away and Makassa is 6.1 km from the hotel.
The units are equipped with air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a electric tea pot, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.
Buffet and halal breakfast options are available every morning at Qala Hotel.
Languages spoken at the reception include English and Russian.
Sar-Khar is 5.6 km from the accommodation, while Kaltarabad is 5.6 km away. The nearest airport is Bukhara International, 6 km from Qala Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
Qala Hotel has been welcoming Booking.com guests since Oct 5, 2021

Mubina Khiva B&B is offering accommodations in Khiva. This bed and breakfast offers free private parking, a 24-hour front desk, and free Wifi. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.
At the bed and breakfast, the units include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, slippers, and a hair dryer. Some units also have a well-equipped kitchen with an oven, a microwave, and a fridge. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne and fruit.
À la carte and Asian breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities, and pancakes are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Guests may eat at the on-site family-friendly restaurant, which is open for dinner and lunch.
For guests with children, Mubina Khiva B&B provides a baby safety gate and babysitting service. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

sign in
.
Grand Karavan in Tashkent provides accommodations with an open-air bath, a bar, and a shared lounge. Private parking is available on site at this sustainable property. The guest house provides quiet street views, a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free Wifi is available throughout the property.
The guest house offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers, and walk-in shower. Every unit has air conditioning, and certain units at the guest house have a balcony. At the guest house, all units are soundproof.
Buffet and full English/Irish breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities, and fresh pastries are available daily at Grand Karavan. Guests can eat at the on-site family-friendly restaurant, which is open for dinner, lunch, brunch, and high tea.
Guests can relax in the garden, swim in the outdoor swimming pool, and take part in fitness classes at the property. Car rental and free use of bicycles are available at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling and walking tours. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at Grand Karavan.
The nearest airport is Islam Karimov Tashkent International Airport, 6.9 km from the guest house.
Couples in particular like the location – they rated it
8.3
for a two-person trip.

Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, free shuttle service, and a 24-hour front desk, along with free Wifi throughout the property. There's free private parking, and the property features a paid airport shuttle service.
Featuring a terrace and mountain views, the villa includes 3 bedrooms, a living room, satellite flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bidet. A private entrance leads guests into the villa, where they can enjoy some fruit and chocolates or cookies. This villa is non-smoking and soundproof.
A continental, halal, or kosher breakfast is available each morning at the property. A mini-market is available at the villa.
Fitness classes are available at the property. A children's playground is also available at the villa, while guests can also relax in the garden.
